ALPHA_PILOT.Name: Высший пилотаж
ALPHA_PILOT.Description: Посадить корабль на солнечной станции вручную.

BEGINNERS_LUCK.Name: Новичкам везёт
BEGINNERS_LUCK.Description: Пройти игру за одну временную петлю.

DEEP_IMPACT.Name: А теперь бомбочкой
DEEP_IMPACT.Description: Войти в океан Пучины Гиганта настолько быстро, чтобы преодолеть течение.

HARMONIC_CONVERGENCE.Name: Орекстр
HARMONIC_CONVERGENCE.Description: Зафиксировать сигналоскопом все инструменты путешественников одновременно.

DIEHARD.Name: Крепкий орешек
DIEHARD.Description: Выйти из временной петли, получив в сумме не менее 1000 единиц урона и не погибнув.

PCHOOOOOOO.Name: Вжух
PCHOOOOOOO.Description: Выстрелить своим кораблём из гравитационной пушки.

GONE_IN_60_SECONDS.Name: Минутное дело
GONE_IN_60_SECONDS.Description: Погибнуть в течение 60 секунд после пробуждения.

CUTTING_IT_CLOSE.Name: Реактивная тяга
CUTTING_IT_CLOSE.Description: Использовать кислород из баллона скафандра не по назначению.

MICAS_WRATH.Name: Слюда запомнит это
MICAS_WRATH.Description: Уничтожить модель ракеты, отправив её на солнце или Пустотную Лампу.

AROUND_THE_WORLD.Name: Around the world in 90 seconds
AROUND_THE_WORLD.Description: Raft around the Stranger in under 90 seconds.

SILENCED_CARTOGRAPHER.Name: The Silenced Cartographer
SILENCED_CARTOGRAPHER.Description: Render the Deep Space Satellite inoperable.

TUBULAR.Name: Tubular!
TUBULAR.Description: Ride the face of the wave for at least 15 seconds on a raft.

EARLY_ADOPTER.Name: Early Adopter
EARLY_ADOPTER.Description: Attempt to use the second artifact prototype. Curiosity killed the cat, but a time loop brought it back.

GRATE_FILTER.Name: The Grate Filter
GRATE_FILTER.Description: Swim through the dam grate. Not everyone makes it!

FLAT_HEARTHER.Name: Flat Hearther
FLAT_HEARTHER.Description: Stand your ground beneath a moving chain elevator.

CELCIUS.Name: Celsius 232.78
CELCIUS.Description: This knowledge isn't going to forbid itself!

GHOSTS.Name: Ghosts in the Machine
GHOSTS.Description: Reach all 3 Forbidden Archives in a single loop without getting caught.

SLEEP_WAKE_REPEAT.Name: Sleep. Wake. Repeat.
SLEEP_WAKE_REPEAT.Description: Be woken up from a dream 5 different ways in a single loop.

SIMULATION.Name: Simulation Hypothesis
SIMULATION.Description: Attempt to use the artifact at a normal campfire. Well, that settles that!

FIRE_ARROWS.Name: Fire Arrows
FIRE_ARROWS.Description: Shoot the Little Scout at the artificial sun in the Stranger.

TAKEMEALIVE.Name: You'll Never Take Me Alive!
TAKEMEALIVE.Description: Escape your pursuers by jumping to your "death" instead of dodging past them.

OOFMYBONES.Name: Oof Ouch, My Bones
OOFMYBONES.Description: Have your spine adjusted by a pursuer.

FOUND_SIGNAL.Name: Found Signal
FOUND_SIGNAL.Description: Uh... You did it I guess?
